LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.label: AI persona core
LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.description: A hyper-advanced computer core that houses a superhumanlike artificial intelligence. In its isolated state the core is dormant. Installed in a proper support structure, however, it can become a mind of frightening power.
LanguageData.Neurotrainer.label: neurotrainer
LanguageData.Neurotrainer.description: A one-use nanotech trainer device. The neurotrainer is inserted through the orbit of the eye and releases nanomachines into the subject's brain, quickly improving their skills in a specific area.
